subject: Order cancellation SSN5904
description_text:
Good morning, I am writing to you again for the cancellation of order
SSN5904. Last Friday I made a purchase by mistake in the shop app and sent
a communication the same day. Since I have not received a response, I am
contacting you again so that you can cancel the order and refund the
amount. Thank you so much!

conversations.body_text: Hi Roberto Ramírez sanz,    Alright, we'll cancel it for you—no worries. We can also modify your order directly, with any difference refunded or charged accordingly.

Good morning, for now I want to cancel it. Later I will take one of your
Pro X Ultra pedalboards, since I see them as quite complete and at a more
than reasonable price. But right now it's not very good for me to do it.
Thank you so much! Greetings and see you soon!

El jue, 15 ene 2026 a las 2:51, service@simsonn.com (
Okay, I've canceled it for you.

Okay, thank you very much! I hope to purchase them soon! All the best!
